title: Shocking moment a large deer bursts through the window of a salon
text:
The moment a large buck burst through the window of a New York salon was captured on surveillance footage Saturday afternoon.

A stylist from Be.you.tiful Hair Salon in Ronkonkoma, New York, is seen trimming a man's hair as another customer sits on the salon's couch to enjoy a beverage.

Moments later, outside the window, a deer is seen running full speed toward the salon after dodging a car along Portion Road.

A stylist (left) from Be.you.tiful Hair Salon is seen trimming a man's hair as another customer sits on the salon's couch to enjoy a beverage. Moments later, outside the window, a deer (circled) is seen running full speed toward the salon after dodging a car along Portion Road

The deer is seen jumping directly over the woman (left) who was sitting on the couch before crashing to the floor (right)

The deer is seen jumping directly over the woman who was sitting on the couch before crashing to the floor. The woman was taken to a hospital with non life-threatening injuries.

It then scrambled to its feet as the customers and stylists screamed in fear.

The animal heads to the back of the salon out of view of the camera as one woman is heard saying: 'Oh my God. Oh my God.'

Moments later the deer is heard coming back toward the front of the salon as it knocks down hair products along the way.

The deer then pushes open the door with its head and makes it way back into the wild with a flat iron attached to its antler.

The hair salon sits next to a travel agency. The deer is believed to have come from the wooded area behind the IHOP restaurants that sits across the road from the salon.
